snippet.title: Truck Mechanic: Dangerous Paths - Prologue (Gameplay Trailer)
snippet.description:
Add 🚛𝗧𝗿𝘂𝗰𝗸 𝗠𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗮𝗻𝗶𝗰: 𝗗𝗮𝗻𝗴𝗲𝗿𝗼𝘂𝘀 𝗣𝗮𝘁𝗵𝘀 - 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘂𝗲🔧 to your wishlist: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1635550/Truck_Mechanic_Dangerous_Paths__Prologue

𝗧𝗿𝘂𝗰𝗸 𝗠𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗮𝗻𝗶𝗰: 𝗗𝗮𝗻𝗴𝗲𝗿𝗼𝘂𝘀 𝗣𝗮𝘁𝗵𝘀 - 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘂𝗲. The prologue is an introduction to the full version of the game, in which you will learn how difficult it is to be a driver in the harsh ecosystem of South America wilderness, and how important mechanic creativity really is in your profession. The prologue will introduce you to the basic mechanics from the full version of the game. Don’t treat it like a demo – it’s a standalone short game showcasing what can you expect.


Social Media:

Twitter► https://twitter.com/atomic_jelly
Instagram► https://www.instagram.com/atomicjelly/
WWW► https://www.atomic-jelly.com
